talk.author: did:plc:spjtdkkdb723gn3qvcagl5nm
talk.utter: I've at least had great customer service responses from DJ whenever I've had a question or there's been some issue with my order, so I'll probably stick with them for the time being. Buyee wasn't bad about it, not the same way the packaging drove me nuts, but they didn't impress me either.

talk.author: did:plc:spjtdkkdb723gn3qvcagl5nm
talk.utter: FWIW I have suspected that many Japanese shopping services can keep their fees low by recouping costs in the difference between postage at wholesale and retail pricing. Customers pay the sticker price on the rate chart; services get a bit off the top. I don't mind this because it's still predictable

talk.author: did:plc:spjtdkkdb723gn3qvcagl5nm
talk.utter: (I do not like it if a service is increasing postage costs unnecessarily, whether through intention or carelessness, though)
